documentType: bureau of prisons count sheet / inmate roster
summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 4, 2019. It records the official inmate count and includes a roster entry for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who was assigned to the hospital unit under suicide watch.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 89673-053, assigned to the hospital unit under suicide watch.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total of 762 inmates.

events.title: Epstein on suicide watch in hospital unit
events.description: Inmate roster shows Jeffrey Epstein was assigned to the hospital unit under suicide watch on this date.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is dated August 4, 2019, which is the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed with registration number 89673-053 and was assigned to the hospital unit.
The roster indicates Epstein was under suicide watch at the time of this document.
The total inmate count at MCC New York on this date was 762 individuals.
This appears to be routine prison administrative documentation showing Epstein's status shortly before his death.
